xrayRegistrationTask.issuingAgency: Department of Environmental Protection, Radiation Protection Element, Bureau of X-Ray Compliance
xrayRegistrationTask.checkStatusText: After applying for your registration, enter the details below. You will receive automatic status updates here. Keep in mind that it will take a week or more for registration to be processed.
xrayRegistrationTask.errorTextNotFound: Your registration could not be found. Check your registration documents.
xrayRegistrationTask.errorTextSearchFailed: Unable to complete check. Try again later.
xrayRegistrationTask.activeDescription: You have paid your annual fee.
xrayRegistrationTask.inactiveDescription: You have deactivated or removed the x-ray machines from your facility. To reactivate,
xrayRegistrationTask.inactiveDescriptionCallToAction: go to the Start Registration tab.
xrayRegistrationTask.expiredDescription: You have not paid your annual fee.
